content: How do i rebuild the extension? I've ran cargo install-ra which installed both the server and the extension, do i need to do anything in VSCode?
install-ra builds the extension. There is also a task in vscode to run/debug the extension if you are hacking on the typescript
Sure, i mean once ive installed, do i need to restart/reinstall the extension in vscode?
cargo install-ra will also install the extension. It's not always needed, but it's a good idea to restart Code afterwards.
Ok so once ive ran cargo install-ra and restarted VSCode im basically good and confident im using the latest version?
